member_organisations:
DACS is a membership organisation with 100,000 members worldwide: http://www.dacs.org.uk/about-us/what-is-dacs 
 
Members are represented directly or through reciprocal or unilateral agreements with sister societies (who are organisations in other jurisdictions managing the rights of visual artists): https://www.dacs.org.uk/about-us/our-network

goals__remit: Established by artists for artists, DACS is a not-for-profit visual artists’ rights management organisation. Passionate about transforming the financial landscape for visual artists through innovative new products and services, DACS acts as a trusted broker for 100,000 artists worldwide. Founded in 1984, DACS is a flagship organisation that has and continues to campaign for artists’ rights, championing their sustained and vital contribution to the creative economy. In its support of artists and their work, DACS collects and distributes royalties to visual artists and their estates through Artist’s Resale Right, Copyright Licensing, Artimage, and via Payback.
